The image of the tweet was flagged as pa: s efforts to combat false news and misinformation on its News Feed.
The tweet was dated December 20: 2017, which was the day Congress passed a $1.5 trillion tax cut bill that Trump signed into law a few days later. Pelosi opposed the measure and Democrats criticized it as favoring the rich.
The Twitter handle: NancyPelosi) in the image is different from Pelosi's actual Twitter account handle (@SpeakerPelosi), and she uses a different photo for her Twitter account.
The tweet was debunked by fact: checking organizations such as Snopes and FactCheck.org, as well as the conservative-leaning Washington Examiner.
